predicates.name: Entity
predicates.description: A thing or concept that exists in the world.

predicates.name: Person
predicates.description: A human being with a specific identity and characteristics.

predicates.name: Work
predicates.description: A creative or intellectual product, such as a book, movie, or song.

predicates.name: Organization
predicates.description: A group of people with a specific purpose or goal.

predicates.name: Location
predicates.description: A place on the Earth's surface, such as a city, country, or continent.

predicates.name: Date
predicates.description: A specific point in time, including dates and times.
